---
title: "Cleaning mRNA"
output: html_notebook
---

Here we removed the non-tummor samples from mRNA files.

```{r}
load(file="../cohortsMRNA.RData")
source("1-getSamplesFromRTCGA.R")

diseases = c("BRCA", "COAD" ,"COADREAD", "GBMLGG", "KIPAN", "KIRC", "LGG", "LUAD",
             "LUSC", "OV", "READ", "UCEC", "KIRP")
folderN = "clean_mRNA"
#dir.create(folderN)

for (i in seq_along(diseases))
{
  disease = diseases[i]
  cat("Cleaning ", disease, "\n")
  getOnlyTumorFromRNAandFilter(disease, paste0(folderN,"/"))
  print("Done")
}

```
